org.apache.juneau

Class BeanSessionArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.SessionArgs
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanSessionArgs
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParserSessionArgs, SerializerSessionArgs

    public class BeanSessionArgs
extends SessionArgs
    Runtime arguments common to all bean, serializer, and parser sessions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BeanSessionArgs(ObjectMap properties, Locale locale, TimeZone timeZone, MediaType mediaType)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BeanSessionArgs

        public BeanSessionArgs(ObjectMap properties,
                       Locale locale,
                       TimeZone timeZone,
                       MediaType mediaType)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        properties - Session-level properties. These override context-level properties. Can be null.
        locale - The session locale. If null, then the locale defined on the context is used.
        timeZone - The session timezone. If null, then the timezone defined on the context is used.
        mediaType - The session media type (e.g. "application/json"). Can be null.
